name: Oatmeal with Protein Powder
instructions: Mix oats with water, microwave 2 min, add protein powder and milk.

name: Boiled Eggs with Toast
instructions: Boil eggs 8 min, toast bread, serve with butter.

name: Greek Yogurt with Fruit
instructions: Mix yogurt with fresh fruit and honey.

name: Scrambled Eggs with Spinach
instructions: Whisk eggs, cook with spinach in pan.

name: Avocado Toast
instructions: Mash avocado, spread on toasted bread.

name: Chicken Wrap
instructions: Grill chicken, wrap with veggies and sauce in tortilla.

instructions: Layer turkey, lettuce, and mayo on whole-grain bread.

instructions: Toss chickpeas with veggies and olive oil dressing.

instructions: Mix tuna with mayo, wrap with lettuce in tortilla.

name: Grilled Chicken Salad
instructions: Grill chicken, toss with mixed greens and dressing.

instructions: Marinate paneer, grill with veggies, serve with chutney.

instructions: Bake salmon, cook quinoa, serve with steamed veggies.

instructions: Stir-fry tofu with veggies and soy sauce.

instructions: Roast pork with seasoned vegetables.

name: Vegetable Omelette

name: Chicken Quinoa Bowl

instructions: Bake cod with seasoned vegetables.
